div.p: Build and maintain highly scalable, low-latency, distributed Enterprise platforms. Build and maintain WebServices based upon service-oriented architecture (SOA) methodologies and leverage enterprise messaging using Enterprise Application Integration/Java Message Ser-vice (EAI/JMS). Design and build highly scalable, multi-threaded ap-plications in Java, No SQL and JSON/XML technologies. Design da-tabase schemas, design and code Data Manipulation Language (DML) queries, analyze query performance and tune java and database appli-cations. Write UNIX scripts. Assist team members by providing design specs, reviewing code and providing review comments. Evaluate prod-ucts including open-source modules and incorporate them into projects as needed.
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent and 6+ years of progressive, post-baccalaureate experience in the job offered or related occupation.
Functional knowledge of “Available to Promise” transactional systems is a plus.
